title: Snake Plant
desc: Also known as Sansevieria, this plant is almost impossible to kill. It tolerates low light, needs little water, and purifies the air.

title: Pothos
desc: A fast-growing vine perfect for shelves or hanging baskets. Pothos is very forgiving and adapts to most environments.

title: Peace Lily
desc: Not only is it stunning with white blooms, but its also easy to grow and effective at improving indoor air quality.

title: Aloe Vera
desc: A succulent with medicinal benefits. Aloe thrives on neglect, making it a favorite for forgetful plant owners.

title: Spider Plant
desc: Its arching leaves and baby plantlets make it attractive and fun. Spider plants grow fast and thrive in hanging pots.

title: ZZ Plant
desc: This tough plant survives in low light and dry conditions. Its waxy leaves add a glossy touch to any room.
